articles.author: Rebecca Beitsch
articles.title: GOP releases critical report of Biden withdrawal from Afghanistan - The Hill
articles.description: A long-awaited GOP report analyzing the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan paints a picture of a President Biden determined to leave the country but fumbling preparations that set the stage for a chaotic and deadly exit from America’s longest war.  The report f…
